itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Scott Davidson, the co-founder of BourBiz, and frequent BourBiz attendee Jack Mandaville, to talk about the latest BourBiz event in San Antonio this Thursday, how the organization started, and why veterans should hook up with BourBiz to get jobs after they leave the service.
